==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|𣦼|食|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s|t2=to eat; meal; food}}.

The upper phonetic portion is an obsolete character, formed from {{zh-l|*歺}} and {{zh-l|*又}}. {{lang|zh|歺}} is sometimes used as an informal simplification for {{lang|zh|餐}} itself.
